detectors.description: Exchange.withdrawToken(address,uint256) (../../../Desktop/mainnet/00/0000010d23CcfEE520c3fb5a5ba9679cB9D83cBE_Exchange.sol#423-431) ignores return value by Token(tokenAddr).transfer(msg.sender,amount) (../../../Desktop/mainnet/00/0000010d23CcfEE520c3fb5a5ba9679cB9D83cBE_Exchange.sol#427)

Exchange.depositToken(address,uint256) (../../../Desktop/mainnet/00/0000010d23CcfEE520c3fb5a5ba9679cB9D83cBE_Exchange.sol#402-410) ignores return value by Token(tokenAddr).transferFrom(msg.sender,this,amount) (../../../Desktop/mainnet/00/0000010d23CcfEE520c3fb5a5ba9679cB9D83cBE_Exchange.sol#405)

Reentrancy in Exchange.fillOrder(uint256,uint256) (../../../Desktop/mainnet/00/0000010d23CcfEE520c3fb5a5ba9679cB9D83cBE_Exchange.sol#303-364):
	External calls:
	- amountEther = calcAmountEther(orders[id].token,orders[id].price,amount) (../../../Desktop/mainnet/00/0000010d23CcfEE520c3fb5a5ba9679cB9D83cBE_Exchange.sol#308)
		- k = k ** Token(tokenAddr).decimals() (../../../Desktop/mainnet/00/0000010d23CcfEE520c3fb5a5ba9679cB9D83cBE_Exchange.sol#250)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- orders[id].amount -= amount (../../../Desktop/mainnet/00/0000010d23CcfEE520c3fb5a5ba9679cB9D83cBE_Exchange.sol#360)
